comments.text:
When you move a bookmark into a folder in the bookmarks toolbar, the theming is quite ugly: The lowered folder 'button' has a default blue background that's not consistent with the other parts of the theme (which are quite glassy). When simply clicking the button, the lowered animation is much better.

Please compare it in this screencast:
http://www.screencast.com/users/Tobbi_/folders/Jing/media/0c8a97fb-0bda-427f-ad20-b8f702cb61a6
